meanings.definition: A flat, thin piece of metal or other material, typically with a design or inscription, used as an award or commemoration.

meanings.definition: A sticky film of bacteria that forms on teeth and can lead to tooth decay.
meanings.sent1: Brushing and flossing regularly helps prevent the buildup of plaques on your teeth.
meanings.sent2: The dentist recommended a special mouthwash to reduce plaques and maintain oral health.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky plaques on his teeth whispered, 'We will cause cavities if you don't brush!'
meanings.sent4: The plaques on her teeth were like tiny invaders, slowly damaging the enamel.
meanings.sent5: She could feel the slimy plaques on her teeth, reminding her to schedule a dental cleaning.

meanings.definition: A patch of abnormal tissue in the body, such as in the brain or arteries.
